page.title: 12FISHING IN THE RIVER BUSH
page.content: { }The{River Bush}is a splendid river for catching{salmon and trout. The largest fish caught in the River Bush was a 15lb. salmon (approx. 32 kgs.) A{permit}to fish a special section that is between the two bridges in Bushmills costs from Â£9.30 to Â£17.50. The increase in price is from July until the end of the season. The section of the River Bush from the north bridge to the river mouth has a permit cost of Â£11.25. These prices are for a day's fishing. To prevent{poaching water baliffs patrol the river banks and contact the police if trouble arises. Fishermen use shrimps, earth worms and fly fishes for their bait. Wet weather is the best for river fishing.
